import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import BrowserHeader from './BrowserHeader' import useNowPlayingMovies from '../../hooks/useNowPlayingMovies' import MainContainer from './MainContainer' import SecondaryContainer from './SecondaryContainer' import usePopularMovies from '../../hooks/usePopularMovies' import useTrendingMovies from '../../hooks/useTrendingMovies' import useUpcomingMovies from '../../hooks/useUpcomingMovies' import BrowserFooter from './BrowserFooter' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import GptPage from '../gpt/GptPage' const Browser = () => { useNowPlayingMovies() usePopularMovies() useTrendingMovies() useUpcomingMovies() let showGpt = useSelector(state=>state.gpt.gptSearch) return (
{ showGpt ? : <> }
) } export default Browser
